overview: This unique film is the beginning of a great friendship with Kristina Belanova, a young lady from the Russian nobility who admires the life of a street hooker. After her first sexual experience with the family's chauffeur (!) she finally embraces horniness. From now on, perverted temptations mark their path. Just became obsessed with Sex exclusively in Eastern Europe. In the first and hot porn tsarina!
title: A Millionaire Hooker - Sex-a-Holic Lady
